docs.snippet: Teams are paying closer attention to the quality and quantity of their players’ rest, which can improve their quickness, strength, reaction time and problem solving....
docs.lead_paragraph: Teams are paying closer attention to the quality and quantity of their players’ rest, which can improve their quickness, strength, reaction time and problem solving.
docs.abstract: NHL franchises are increasingly paying attention to quality and quantity of players' sleep; sleep researcher Cheri Mah is viewed as integral to success of San Jose Sharks during away games, as team has achieved its best road record with Mah's help.

headline.main: N.H.L. Teams Dream of a Title After a Good Night’s Sleep
headline.print_headline: Dreaming of a Title After a Good Night’s Sleep

docs.snippet: Benjamin Alexander cannot speak, but he is determined to be heard. He cannot type without a hand to support his, and yet he writes and writes, his inner voice shouting out his thoughts. He returns repeatedly to the "fiend" that tried to silence hi...
docs.lead_paragraph: Benjamin Alexander cannot speak, but he is determined to be heard. He cannot type without a hand to support his, and yet he writes and writes, his inner voice shouting out his thoughts. He returns repeatedly to the "fiend" that tried to silence him, the autism he sarcastically calls his "gift."

headline.main: 'I Am Here'-Silenced by Autism, Young Man Finds His Voice
headline.print_headline: 'I Am Here'-Silenced by Autism, Young Man Finds His Voice
